link.helpText: which page does this banner lead to?

img.helpText: no more than 1600 pixels wide and no more than 520 pixels high.

type.helpText: if you place several banners of one type, they will be shown in it in random order.

active.helpText: if you untick this box, you will temporarily switch off the demonstration of this banner on the website, but the settings will remain and the image will not be deleted.
